alert.note: Alert for Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 9:56AM EDT until July 26 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Mason County in west central Michigan... Northern Oceana County in west central Michigan... * Until 1045 AM EDT. * At 955 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Ludington SP to 10 miles west of Mears SP to 20 miles west of Silver Lake SP, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ludington around 1010 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Scottville, Silver Lake SP, Mears, Hart and Pentwater. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
